headerDisplay: This accessory will play/cast audio and/or video to your Chromecast on demand. It can be used for automation. The list of media (audio/video) to be played must be stored on a file. The plugin will pick a random media from the file every time you turn on the switch. If you want to apply always the same, create a json file with only one media.
footerDisplay: For help with format of each media object: [Media File](https://github.com/paolotremadio/homebridge-automation-chromecast-play#media-file).

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

time.title: Time
time.description: How long Pi-hole will be disabled, in seconds, default is 0 that means permanently disabled.

logLevel.title: Loging level
logLevel.description: Three different levels: 0: logging disabled, 1: logs only HTTP errors (Default), 2: logs each HTTP response.
